Mr. Hockey: The Gordie Howe Story

Ano: 2013

IMDb ID: tt0883391

Classificação: 6.7

Sinopse: Hockey great Gordie Howe retired after 25 winning seasons with the Detroit Red Wings. But he realized that retirement just didn't work for him. When his son's were drafted to the Houston Aeros he came out of retirement to join the team. He was written off by many, who thought he was too old to be playing competitively.
